about.title: Our Story
about.heroText: Founded on the belief that great food brings people together, Zaporio started as a small family dream and has grown into a beloved community gathering place.
about.storyContent: It all started in 2018 when our founder decided to pursue a passion for creating the perfect dining experience. After years of perfecting recipes, the first Zaporio location was opened with a simple mission: serve honest, delicious food made with love.  What began as a small neighborhood spot has grown into a local institution, but we've never forgotten our roots. Every dish is still hand-crafted with the same care and attention that went into the very first ones.

values.title: Sustainability
values.description: We partner with local farms and suppliers who share our commitment to sustainable practices and environmental responsibility.

values.title: Community
values.description: We believe in giving back to our community and supporting local initiatives that make our neighborhood stronger.

values.title: Quality
values.description: Every ingredient is carefully selected and every dish is made to order, ensuring the highest quality in every bite.

values.title: Passion
values.description: Our team is passionate about food and hospitality, and it shows in everything we do, from cooking to customer service.

teamMembers.name: Founder & Head Chef
teamMembers.bio: With 15 years of culinary experience, our founder's passion for cooking started in their grandmother's kitchen.

teamMembers.name: General Manager
teamMembers.bio: Ensures every customer has an exceptional experience. Their attention to detail keeps everything running smoothly.

teamMembers.name: Sous Chef
teamMembers.bio: Creativity and precision in the kitchen help maintain our high standards and develop new menu items.

contact.title: Get in Touch
contact.subtitle: We'd love to hear from you! Whether you have questions, feedback, or just want to say hello, don't hesitate to reach out.

home.title: Welcome to Zaporio
home.section_1_content: Inspired by the streeet food vibes of Seattle, Zaporio was launched in January 2022 to deliver simple, wholesome street food in a zap.

order.title: How to Get Your Burger
order.takeaway_content: "Visit us at Munro Place, Elgin, IV30 4LL. No need to pre-order just come along! View our opening times here."
order.click_collect_content: "You can now order your food online! Just pick your food and choose a collection time."
order.delivery_content: "Afraid not. We don't offer delivery because we don't believe burgers and fries travel well, and we only want you to have the best."
order.eat_in_content: "You can take your food into Foggies and enjoy some drinks with your meal. To book a table with Foggies please call 01343 611161. When you arrive, simply head through to us to order your food and you will be given a buzzer which reaches next door meaning you can relax while you wait!"
